meanings.definition: A person who brings a lawsuit or seeks legal remedy.
meanings.sent1: The suer filed a lawsuit against the company for unfair treatment.
meanings.sent2: The suer sought legal advice before taking any action.
meanings.sent3: The suer's friends supported them during the legal battle.
meanings.sent4: Being a suer requires patience and determination in seeking justice.
meanings.sent5: The suer's determination to fight for their rights inspired others.

meanings.definition: To make a petition or appeal.
meanings.sent1: She will suer for a change in the school policy.
meanings.sent2: They decided to suer for more funding for the community center.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he would suer for more pizza at the party.
meanings.sent4: The team will suer for additional practice time before the big game.
meanings.sent5: It's important to suer for what you believe in.

meanings.sent1: He will suer her with flowers and love letters.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys when he suers her with romantic gestures.
meanings.sent3: The suer planned a surprise picnic by the lake.
meanings.sent4: His efforts to suer her won her heart in the end.
meanings.sent5: She felt special when he would suer her with compliments.
